segments.text: I came in to see how my home inspection went .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First of all , I need to share what the purpose of a home inspection is . Do you understand what I was doing there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had a home inspection before , but didn ’ t really understand it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I help you spot potential problems with the home before you purchase it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The owner said that the roof had leaked , but that he got it fixed last month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sellers aren ’ t really all that objective . They may have gotten used to a leaky faucet , but it is still broken .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are the sellers responsible for fixing the problems with the house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The owners may wish to pay to have the problems fixed , or maybe the price of the house can be reduced .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you find a lot of things wrong during the home inspection ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The house has a very outdated electrical system . Many of the switches and outlets do not work and are unsafe .
segments.speaker: S2
